column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Parking can be a hassle; their is a parking garage
column2: but it is only three or four (can't remember) floors
column4: and the rest is often occupied by a lot of the gym-goers... you CAN park on the street though
column5: but it's pretty damn terrifying parking on a road that comes right off of a freeway... ‚Äç
